import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { LoginService } from '../service/login.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'], }) export class NavbarComponent { isLogin: boolean = false; constructor(private login: LoginService) {} ngOnInit() { // this.login.isSignedIn$.subscribe((status) => { // this.isLogin = status; // }); } // logOut() { // this.login.setSignin(false); // } }
